title: Roundup: Killer new bike lights & locks from Eurobike 2021
content:
New locks from German brands Abus and Tex-Lock give you more reach and clever new features for securing your bike, and slimmer lights from Supernova add braking and aerodynamics to the mix. Let’s start with locks… Tex-Lock Cable & U-Lock Combos What caught our eye in Tex-Lock’s booth were the extremely long cable locks with

author: Tyler Benedict
